popup_search.description: Placeholder/label for search input in popup

popup_host_app_nag_update.message: Your installed hostApp version is $currentVersion$ while the latest version is $latestVersion$. Some things might not work correctly until you upgrade.

popup_host_app_error_title.description: title for the error component when there was an error with the hostapp

popup_host_app_error_message_internal.message: An error occured communicating with the host application. It might not be installed or configured incorrectly. For troubleshooting choose one of the following:
popup_host_app_error_message_internal.description: message for the error component when there was an internal error with the hostapp

popup_host_app_error_message_pass.message: An error has been encountered when executing pass. The error message has been hidden as it may contain sensitive information. For troubleshooting choose one of the following:
popup_host_app_error_message_pass.description: message for the error component when there was an error when executing pass

popup_error_message_react.message: An unknown error has been encountered. The error message has been hidden as it may contain sensitive information. For troubleshooting choose one of the following:
popup_error_message_react.description: message for the error component when there was an error while rendering

popup_error_option_back.message: go back and do something different

extensionDescription.message: browser addon for the passwordstore password manager

extension_pass_action_show.description: Label for the 'show password' menu entry

extension_pass_action_fill.description: Label for the 'fill password' menu entry

extension_qrcode_action_show.description: Label for the 'show password as QR Code' menu entry

options_tab_extensions.description: Label for 'Extensions' Tab in the Option menu

options_extension_qrcode_test_message.description: message encoded in the example qr code on the options page

options_tab_matchers.description: Label for 'Matching Strategies' Tab in the Option menu

options_tab_file_formats.description: Label for 'File Format Strategies' Tab in the Option menu

options_tab_fillers.description: Label for 'Filling Strategies' Tab in the Option menu

options_tab_other.description: label for 'other' Tab in the Option menu

options_reset_extension.message: reset all options and reload passB

options_reset_extension_confirm.message: This will reset all options and reload passB. Are you sure?

options_simplematcher_ignoreLastPart.message: Ignore the last part of the password path (if you are using it as your login name)

options_selectorfiller_defaultUsernameSe.message: Leave empty to only fill if there's a selector specified in the pass file

options_selectorfiller_defaultPasswordSe.message: Leave empty to only fill if there's a selector specified in the pass file

options_selectorfiller_fillOnlyFirstMatc.message: Fill only the first matching input field

options_selectorfiller_prefix_explanatio.message: If the pass file contains a line starting with one of these prefixes, that selector will be used instead.
